javadoc:
A class to store the information needed for a single
 program relocation.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address where the relocation is required

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of relocation to perform

params.name: values
params.comment: the values needed when performing the relocation

params.name: bytes
params.comment: original instruction bytes affected by relocation

params.name: symbolName
params.comment: the name of the symbol being relocated

methods.javadoc:
Returns the address where the relocation is required.
@return the address where the relocation is required
methods.name: getAddress
methods.comment: Returns the address where the relocation is required.

return.comment: the address where the relocation is required

methods.javadoc:
Returns the type of the relocation to perform.
@return the type of the relocation to perform
methods.name: getType
methods.comment: Returns the type of the relocation to perform.

return.comment: the type of the relocation to perform

methods.javadoc:
Returns the value needed when performing the relocation.
@return the value needed when performing the relocation
methods.name: getValues
methods.comment: Returns the value needed when performing the relocation.

return.comment: the value needed when performing the relocation

methods.javadoc:
Returns the original instruction bytes affected by relocation.
@return original instruction bytes affected by relocation
methods.name: getBytes
methods.comment: Returns the original instruction bytes affected by relocation.

return.comment: original instruction bytes affected by relocation

methods.javadoc:
The name of the symbol being relocated or <tt>null</tt> if there is no symbol name.
@return the name of the symbol being relocated or <tt>null</tt> if there is no symbol name.
methods.name: getSymbolName
methods.comment: The name of the symbol being relocated or null if there is no symbol name.

return.comment: the name of the symbol being relocated or null if there is no symbol name.

name: Relocation
comment:
A class to store the information needed for a single
 program relocation.
